title: Most popular crisps and savoury snack brands in the United Kingdom ( UK ) 2013
summary: This statistic presents the Most popular crisps Snack in the United Kingdom ( UK ) , ranked by Most purchased among consumers in a survey conducted in 2013 .
According to the survey results , the leading alcoholic crisps Walkers was purchased by 42 % of respondents , followed by Doritos 's at 32 % .
crisps consumption is more common in the off-trade than the on-trade , with Walkers the Most popular crisps category when based on the distribution of sales .
gold: This statistic displays the leading crisp and savory snack brands in the United Kingdom ( UK ) , ranked by most purchased . According to the survey conducted in November 2013 , the leading six products were all crisps . Walkers ranked highest with 42 percent of respondents purchasing their crisps at the time of survey , followed by Doritos at 32 percent .
